summary: CONSUMER SMELLED BURNING RUBBER, AND THEN THE VEHICLE STALLED AND   FLAMES EMITTED FROM UNDER THE HOOD.  THE INSURANCE INSPECTOR INDICATED THE FIRE WAS CAUSED BY A FUEL LINE FAILURE AT THE PASSENGER SIDE FIREWALL.  THE VEHICLE WAS TOTALED, BUT DEALERSHIP DIDN'T OFFER ANY CONTRIBUTIONS TO FIX THE CAR.   *CB  *JB
